alert.note: Alert for Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberville Parish through 615 PM CDT... At 544 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Butte La Rose, or 9 miles northeast of Catahoula, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Iberville Parish. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
